GetOperations.Name: Get
GetOperations.Description: Gets the details of the specified email notification(alert) configuration.

CreateOperations.Name: CreateOrUpdate
CreateOperations.Description: Create or update an email notification(alert) configuration.

UpdateOperations.Name: Update
UpdateOperations.Description: Create or update an email notification(alert) configuration.

ListOperations.Name: GetAll
ListOperations.Description: Gets the list of email notification(alert) configurations for the vault.

GetOperations.Name: Get
GetOperations.Description: Validates whether a given VM can be protected or not in which case returns list of errors.

ListOperations.Name: GetAll
ListOperations.Description: Validates whether a given VM can be protected or not in which case returns list of errors.

GetOperations.Name: Get
GetOperations.Description: The operation to get the details of an Azure Site recovery event.

ListOperations.Name: GetAll
ListOperations.Description: Gets the list of Azure Site Recovery events for the vault.

GetOperations.Name: Get
GetOperations.Description: Gets the details of an Azure Site Recovery fabric.

CreateOperations.Name: CreateOrUpdate
CreateOperations.Description: The operation to create an Azure Site Recovery fabric (for e.g. Hyper-V site).

UpdateOperations.Name: Update
UpdateOperations.Description: The operation to create an Azure Site Recovery fabric (for e.g. Hyper-V site).

ListOperations.Name: GetAll
ListOperations.Description: Gets a list of the Azure Site Recovery fabrics in the vault.

OtherOperations.Name: CheckConsistency
OtherOperations.Description: The operation to perform a consistency check on the fabric.

OtherOperations.Name: MigrateToAad
OtherOperations.Description: The operation to migrate an Azure Site Recovery fabric to AAD.

OtherOperations.Name: ReassociateGateway
OtherOperations.Description: The operation to move replications from a process server to another process server.

OtherOperations.Name: Delete
OtherOperations.Description: The operation to delete or remove an Azure Site Recovery fabric.

OtherOperations.Name: RenewCertificate
OtherOperations.Description: Renews the connection certificate for the ASR replication fabric.

GetOperations.Name: Get
GetOperations.Description: Gets the details of a logical network.

ListOperations.Name: GetAll
ListOperations.Description: Lists all the logical networks of the Azure Site Recovery fabric.

GetOperations.Name: Get
GetOperations.Description: Gets the details of a network.

ListOperations.Name: GetAll
ListOperations.Description: Lists the networks available for a fabric.

OperationsFromResourceGroupExtension.Name: GetSiteRecoveryNetworks
OperationsFromResourceGroupExtension.Description: Lists the networks available in a vault.

GetOperations.Name: Get
GetOperations.Description: Gets the details of an ASR network mapping.

CreateOperations.Name: CreateOrUpdate
CreateOperations.Description: The operation to create an ASR network mapping.

UpdateOperations.Name: Update
UpdateOperations.Description: The operation to update an ASR network mapping.

DeleteOperations.Name: Delete
DeleteOperations.Description: The operation to delete a network mapping.

ListOperations.Name: GetAll
ListOperations.Description: Lists all ASR network mappings for the specified network.

OperationsFromResourceGroupExtension.Name: GetSiteRecoveryNetworkMappings
OperationsFromResourceGroupExtension.Description: Lists all ASR network mappings in the vault.

GetOperations.Name: Get
GetOperations.Description: Gets the details of a protection container.

CreateOperations.Name: CreateOrUpdate
CreateOperations.Description: Operation to create a protection container.

UpdateOperations.Name: Update
UpdateOperations.Description: Operation to create a protection container.

ListOperations.Name: GetAll
ListOperations.Description: Lists the protection containers in the specified fabric.

OperationsFromResourceGroupExtension.Name: GetSiteRecoveryProtectionContainers
OperationsFromResourceGroupExtension.Description: Lists the protection containers in a vault.

OtherOperations.Name: DiscoverProtectableItem
OtherOperations.Description: The operation to a add a protectable item to a protection container(Add physical server).

OtherOperations.Name: Delete
OtherOperations.Description: Operation to remove a protection container.

OtherOperations.Name: SwitchProtection
OtherOperations.Description: Operation to switch protection from one container to another or one replication provider to another.

GetOperations.Name: Get
GetOperations.Description: Gets the details of a migration item.

CreateOperations.Name: CreateOrUpdate
CreateOperations.Description: The operation to create an ASR migration item (enable migration).

UpdateOperations.Name: Update
UpdateOperations.Description: The operation to update the recovery settings of an ASR migration item.

DeleteOperations.Name: Delete
DeleteOperations.Description: The operation to delete an ASR migration item.

ListOperations.Name: GetAll
ListOperations.Description: Gets the list of ASR migration items in the protection container.

OperationsFromResourceGroupExtension.Name: GetSiteRecoveryMigrationItems
OperationsFromResourceGroupExtension.Description: Gets the list of migration items in the vault.

OtherOperations.Name: Migrate
OtherOperations.Description: The operation to initiate migration of the item.

OtherOperations.Name: PauseReplication
OtherOperations.Description: The operation to initiate pause replication of the item.

OtherOperations.Name: ResumeReplication
OtherOperations.Description: The operation to initiate resume replication of the item.

OtherOperations.Name: Resync
OtherOperations.Description: The operation to resynchronize replication of an ASR migration item.

OtherOperations.Name: TestMigrate
OtherOperations.Description: The operation to initiate test migration of the item.

OtherOperations.Name: TestMigrateCleanup
OtherOperations.Description: The operation to initiate test migrate cleanup.

GetOperations.Name: Get
GetOperations.Description: Gets a recovery point for a migration item.

ListOperations.Name: GetAll
ListOperations.Description: Gets the recovery points for a migration item.

GetOperations.Name: Get
GetOperations.Description: The operation to get the details of a protectable item.

ListOperations.Name: GetAll
ListOperations.Description: Lists the protectable items in a protection container.

GetOperations.Name: Get
GetOperations.Description: Gets the details of an ASR replication protected item.

CreateOperations.Name: CreateOrUpdate
CreateOperations.Description: The operation to create an ASR replication protected item (Enable replication).

UpdateOperations.Name: Update
UpdateOperations.Description: The operation to update the recovery settings of an ASR replication protected item.

DeleteOperations.Name: Delete
DeleteOperations.Description: The operation to delete or purge a replication protected item. This operation will force delete the replication protected item. Use the remove operation on replication protected item to perform a clean disable replication for the item.

ListOperations.Name: GetAll
ListOperations.Description: Gets the list of ASR replication protected items in the protection container.

OperationsFromResourceGroupExtension.Name: GetReplicationProtectedItems
OperationsFromResourceGroupExtension.Description: Gets the list of ASR replication protected items in the vault.

OtherOperations.Name: AddDisks
OtherOperations.Description: Operation to add disks(s) to the replication protected item.

OtherOperations.Name: ApplyRecoveryPoint
OtherOperations.Description: The operation to change the recovery point of a failed over replication protected item.

OtherOperations.Name: FailoverCancel
OtherOperations.Description: Operation to cancel the failover of the replication protected item.

OtherOperations.Name: FailoverCommit
OtherOperations.Description: Operation to commit the failover of the replication protected item.

OtherOperations.Name: PlannedFailover
OtherOperations.Description: Operation to initiate a planned failover of the replication protected item.

OtherOperations.Name: Delete
OtherOperations.Description: The operation to disable replication on a replication protected item. This will also remove the item.

OtherOperations.Name: RemoveDisks
OtherOperations.Description: Operation to remove disk(s) from the replication protected item.

OtherOperations.Name: RepairReplication
OtherOperations.Description: The operation to start resynchronize/repair replication for a replication protected item requiring resynchronization.

OtherOperations.Name: Reprotect
OtherOperations.Description: Operation to reprotect or reverse replicate a failed over replication protected item.

OtherOperations.Name: ResolveHealthErrors
OtherOperations.Description: Operation to resolve health issues of the replication protected item.

OtherOperations.Name: SwitchProvider
OtherOperations.Description: Operation to initiate a switch provider of the replication protected item.

OtherOperations.Name: TestFailover
OtherOperations.Description: Operation to perform a test failover of the replication protected item.

OtherOperations.Name: TestFailoverCleanup
OtherOperations.Description: Operation to clean up the test failover of a replication protected item.

OtherOperations.Name: UnplannedFailover
OtherOperations.Description: Operation to initiate a failover of the replication protected item.

OtherOperations.Name: UpdateAppliance
OtherOperations.Description: The operation to update appliance of an ASR replication protected item.

OtherOperations.Name: UpdateMobilityService
OtherOperations.Description: The operation to update(push update) the installed mobility service software on a replication protected item to the latest available version.

OtherOperations.Name: GetTargetComputeSizesByReplicationProtectedItems
OtherOperations.Description: Lists the available target compute sizes for a replication protected item.

GetOperations.Name: Get
GetOperations.Description: Get the details of specified recovery point.

ListOperations.Name: GetAll
ListOperations.Description: Lists the available recovery points for a replication protected item.

GetOperations.Name: Get
GetOperations.Description: Gets the details of a protection container mapping.

CreateOperations.Name: CreateOrUpdate
CreateOperations.Description: The operation to create a protection container mapping.

UpdateOperations.Name: Update
UpdateOperations.Description: The operation to update protection container mapping.

DeleteOperations.Name: Delete
DeleteOperations.Description: The operation to purge(force delete) a protection container mapping.

ListOperations.Name: GetAll
ListOperations.Description: Lists the protection container mappings for a protection container.

OperationsFromResourceGroupExtension.Name: GetProtectionContainerMappings
OperationsFromResourceGroupExtension.Description: Lists the protection container mappings in the vault.

OtherOperations.Name: Delete
OtherOperations.Description: The operation to delete or remove a protection container mapping.

GetOperations.Name: Get
GetOperations.Description: Gets the details of registered recovery services provider.

CreateOperations.Name: CreateOrUpdate
CreateOperations.Description: The operation to add a recovery services provider.

UpdateOperations.Name: Update
UpdateOperations.Description: The operation to add a recovery services provider.

ListOperations.Name: GetAll
ListOperations.Description: Lists the registered recovery services providers for the specified fabric.

OperationsFromResourceGroupExtension.Name: GetSiteRecoveryServicesProviders
OperationsFromResourceGroupExtension.Description: Lists the registered recovery services providers in the vault.

OtherOperations.Name: RefreshProvider
OtherOperations.Description: The operation to refresh the information from the recovery services provider.

OtherOperations.Name: Delete
OtherOperations.Description: The operation to removes/delete(unregister) a recovery services provider from the vault.

GetOperations.Description: Gets the details of the specified storage classification.

ListOperations.Description: Lists the storage classifications available in the specified fabric.

OperationsFromResourceGroupExtension.Name: GetStorageClassifications

GetOperations.Description: Gets the details of the specified storage classification mapping.

CreateOperations.Name: CreateOrUpdate
CreateOperations.Description: The operation to create a storage classification mapping.

UpdateOperations.Name: Update
UpdateOperations.Description: The operation to create a storage classification mapping.

DeleteOperations.Name: Delete
DeleteOperations.Description: The operation to delete a storage classification mapping.

ListOperations.Name: GetAll
ListOperations.Description: Lists the storage classification mappings for the fabric.

OperationsFromResourceGroupExtension.Name: GetStorageClassificationMappings
OperationsFromResourceGroupExtension.Description: Lists the storage classification mappings in the vault.

GetOperations.Name: Get
GetOperations.Description: Gets the details of a registered vCenter server(Add vCenter server).

CreateOperations.Name: CreateOrUpdate
CreateOperations.Description: The operation to create a vCenter object..

UpdateOperations.Name: Update
UpdateOperations.Description: The operation to update a registered vCenter.

DeleteOperations.Name: Delete
DeleteOperations.Description: The operation to remove(unregister) a registered vCenter server from the vault.

ListOperations.Name: GetAll
ListOperations.Description: Lists the vCenter servers registered in a fabric.

OperationsFromResourceGroupExtension.Name: GetSiteRecoveryVCenters
OperationsFromResourceGroupExtension.Description: Lists the vCenter servers registered in the vault.

GetOperations.Name: Get
GetOperations.Description: Get the details of an Azure Site Recovery job.

ListOperations.Description: Gets the list of Azure Site Recovery Jobs for the vault.

OtherOperations.Description: The operation to cancel an Azure Site Recovery job.

OtherOperations.Name: Restart
OtherOperations.Description: The operation to restart an Azure Site Recovery job.

OtherOperations.Name: Resume
OtherOperations.Description: The operation to resume an Azure Site Recovery job.

OtherOperations.Name: Export
OtherOperations.Description: The operation to export the details of the Azure Site Recovery jobs of the vault.

GetOperations.Name: Get
GetOperations.Description: Gets the details of a replication policy.

CreateOperations.Description: The operation to create a replication policy.

UpdateOperations.Name: Update
UpdateOperations.Description: The operation to update a replication policy.

DeleteOperations.Name: Delete
DeleteOperations.Description: The operation to delete a replication policy.

ListOperations.Description: Lists the replication policies for a vault.

GetOperations.Name: Get
GetOperations.Description: Gets the details of an ASR replication protection intent.

CreateOperations.Description: The operation to create an ASR replication protection intent item.

UpdateOperations.Name: Update
UpdateOperations.Description: The operation to create an ASR replication protection intent item.

ListOperations.Name: GetAll
ListOperations.Description: Gets the list of ASR replication protection intent objects in the vault.

GetOperations.Name: Get
GetOperations.Description: Gets the details of the recovery plan.

CreateOperations.Name: CreateOrUpdate
CreateOperations.Description: The operation to create a recovery plan.

UpdateOperations.Name: Update
UpdateOperations.Description: The operation to update a recovery plan.

ListOperations.Name: GetAll
ListOperations.Description: Lists the recovery plans in the vault.

OtherOperations.Name: FailoverCancel
OtherOperations.Description: The operation to cancel the failover of a recovery plan.

OtherOperations.Description: The operation to commit the failover of a recovery plan.

OtherOperations.Description: The operation to start the unplanned failover of a recovery plan.

GetOperations.Name: Get
GetOperations.Description: Gets the vault setting. This includes the Migration Hub connection settings.

CreateOperations.Description: The operation to configure vault setting.

UpdateOperations.Name: Update
UpdateOperations.Description: The operation to configure vault setting.

ListOperations.Name: GetAll
ListOperations.Description: Gets the list of vault setting. This includes the Migration Hub connection settings.
